sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Removes duplicate elements from an array based on a key.
Inputs
array: JSON string representing an array of objects to process. Example: [{"email":"a@ex.com"},{"email":"b@ex.com"}].
key: Object field name used to detect duplicates. Example: email.
keep: Determines whether to keep the first or the last occurrence of duplicated entries.
case_insensitive: When true, treats field values as case-insensitive (A@ex.com equals a@ex.com).
trim: When true, trims whitespace before comparing values (e.g., " a@ex.com " equals "a@ex.com").
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Array - Unique By Key
